file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Impala Hotel Booking API
  description: |
    This is a generated connector for [Impala API v1.0.0](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/branches/v1.003/YXBpOjQwMDYwNDY-impala-hotel-booking-api) OpenAPI specification.  
    The Impala API provides the capability to search, book or sell hotels rooms.

    Add room selling to your app with ease, or expand your existing hotel
    portfolio. Access all the marketing material you need to sell a room, from
    hotel amenities to images. Constantly updated, ever expanding and always
    correct. Impala allows you to start selling hotel rooms and earn a
    commission with every booking in hours.
  x-ballerina-init-description: |
    The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials.
    Create an [Impala](https://impala.travel/signup/) account and obtain tokens using [this guide](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/ZG9jOjEwMjE0Mg-book-a-hotel-through-the-api-in-just-5-minutes).
  version: 1.0.0
  x-ballerina-display:
      label: Impala
      iconPath: "icon.png"
servers:
  - url: https://sandbox.impala.travel/v1/
security:
- apiToken: []
components:
  securitySchemes:
    # bearerAuth:
    #   type: http
    #   scheme: bearer
    apiToken:
      type: apiKey
      in: header
      name: x-api-key
      description: "Provide your API Key as Api-Token. Eg: {x-api-key : <Your API Key>}
        Your API key can be found in your account"
  schemas:
    Hotel: 
      title: Hotel
      type: object
      required:
        - hotelId
        - name
        - currency
        - starRating
        - phoneNumbers
        - emails
        - websiteUrl
        - externalUrls
        - images
        - amenities
        - roomTypes
        - roomCount
        - checkIn
        - checkOut
        - contractable
        - termsAndConditions
      properties:
        hotelId:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        currency:
          type: string
        starRating:
          type: number
          format: double
        description:
          type: object
          properties:
            short:
              type: string
        contractable:
          type: boolean
        emails:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        websiteUrl:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        externalUrls:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties: 
              name:
                type: string
              url: 
                type: string
        phoneNumbers:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        images:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Image"
        address:
          type: object
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Address"
        location:
          type: object
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Location"
        timezone:
          type: string
        amenities:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Amenity"
        roomTypes:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/RoomTypes"
        roomCount:
          type: number
        termsAndConditions: 
          type: string
        createdAt:
          type: string
        updatedAt:
          type: string
        checkIn:
          type: object
          properties: 
            from:
              type: string
            to: 
              type: string
        checkOut:
          type: object
          properties: 
            from:
              type: string
            to: 
              type: string
    Image:
      title: Image
      type: object
      required:
        - height
        - width
        - url
      properties:
        altText:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        height:
          type: number
        width:  
          type: number
        url:
          type: string
    Address:
      title: Address
      type: object
      required:
        - line1
        - city
        - country
        - countryName
        - postalCode
      properties: 
        line1:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        line2:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        city:
          type: string
        region: 
          type: string
          nullable: true
        country:
          type: string
        countryName:
          type: string
        postalCode:
          type: string
    Location:
      title: Location
      type: object
      required: 
        - latitude
        - longitude
      properties:
        latitude:
          type: integer
        longitude:
          type: integer
    Amenity:
      title: Amenity
      type: object
      required: 
        - code
        - formatted
      properties:
        code:
          type: number
        formatted:
          type: string
    RoomTypes:
      title: RoomTypes
      type: object
      required:
        - roomTypeId
        - name
        - description
        - maxOccupancy
        - images
        - amenities
      properties:
        roomTypeId:
          type: string
        name: 
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        maxOccupancy:
          type: integer
        rates: 
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/RoomRate"
        images:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Image"
        amenities:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Amenity"
    RoomRate:
      title: RoomRate
      type: object
      required: 
        - rateId
        - start
        - end
        - maxOccupancy
        - hotelAgreement
        - retailRate
        - sellerCommissionPercentage
        - components
        - cancellationPolicies
      properties:
        rateId:
          type: string
        start:  
          type: string
        end:
          type: string
        maxOccupancy:
          type: integer
        retailRate:
          type: object
          properties: 
            total: 
              type: object
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Money"
            taxesAndFees:
              type: object
              nullable: true
              properties:
                payAtHotel:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    properties:
                      formatted:  
                        type: string
                      category: 
                        type: string
                      charge:
                        type: object
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Money"
                includedInRate:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    properties:
                        formatted:  
                          type: string
                        category: 
                          type: string
                        charge:
                          type: object
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Money"
        sellerToImpalaPayment:
          type: obejct
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Money"
        sellerCommissionPercentage:
          type: number
        components: 
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              formatted:
                type: string
              type:
                type: string
              includedInRate:
                type: boolean
        hotelAgreement:
          type: object
          nullable: true
          required:
            - hotelAgreementId
            - dealId
            - specialInstructions
          properties: 
            hotelAgreementId:
              type: string
            dealId: 
              type: string
            conditions:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
            discount: 
              type: object
              properties: 
                count: 
                  type: number
                type: 
                  type: string
            specialInstructions:
              type: string
            dealsSellable:
              type: object
              properties:
                remaining:
                  type: number
            href:
              type: string
    Booking:
      title: Booking
      type: object
      required:
        - bookingId
        - status
        - start
        - end 
        - hotel 
        - bookedRooms
        - contact 
        - notes 
        - createdAt 
        - updatedAt 
      properties:
        bookingId:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        hotelConfirmationCode:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        start:
          type: string
        end: 
          type: string
        hotel:
          type: object
          required:
            - hotelId
            - name
            - starRating 
            - images 
            - address
            - location
          properties:
            hotelId:
              type: string
            name:
              type: string
            currency:
              type: string
            starRating:
              type: number
              format: double
            emails:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
            phoneNumbers:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
            images:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Image"
            address:
              type: object
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Address"
            location:
              type: object
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Location"
            timezone:
              type: string
        bookedRooms:
          type: array
          items: 
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/BookedRooms"
        contact:
          type: object
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Person"
        notes:
          type: object
          properties:
            fromGuest:
              type: string
              nullable: true 
            fromSeller: 
              type: string
              nullable: true 
        createdAt:
          type: string 
        updatedAt: 
          type: string
        cancellation: 
          type: object
          nullable: true 
          properties: 
            fee: 
              type: object 
              properties: 
                type: 
                  type: string
                count: 
                  type: string
                price: 
                  type: object
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Money"
        paymentBearerToken:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        paymentClientSecret:
          type: string
          nullable: true
    BookedRooms:
      title: BookedRooms
      type: object
      required:
        - roomType
        - rate
        - notes
      properties: 
        roomType:
          type: object
          required:
            - roomTypeId
            - name
          properties:
            roomTypeId:
              type: string
            name: 
              type: string
        adults:
          type: integer
        rate: 
          type: object
          required:
            - start
            - end
            - retailRate
            - sellerCommissionPercentage
            - components
            - cancellationPolicies
          properties: 
            start: 
              type: string
            end: 
              type: string
            hotelAgreement: 
              type: object
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/HotelAgreement"
            retailRate:
              type: object
              properties:
                total:
                  type: object
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Money"
                taxesAndFees:
                  type: object
                  properties: 
                    payAtHotel:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        properties:
                          formatted:  
                            type: string
                          category: 
                            type: string
                          charge:
                            type: object
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Money"
                    includedInRate:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        properties:
                            formatted:  
                              type: string
                            category: 
                              type: string
                            charge:
                              type: object
                              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Money"
            sellerCommissionPercentage:
              type: number
              format: float
            components:
              type: array
              items: 
                properties:
                  formatted: 
                    type: string
                  type:       
                    type: string 
                  includedInRate: 
                    type: boolean
            cancellationPolicies:
              type: array
              items:
                type: object
                properties: 
                  start:
                    type: string
                  end:  
                    type: string
                  formatted:
                    type: string
                  fee: 
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      type: 
                        type: string
                      count:  
                        type: number
                      price: 
                        type: object
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Money"
            maxOccupancy:
              type: number
        sellerToImpalaPayment:
          type: object
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Money"
        notes: 
          type: obejct
          properties:
            fromGuest:
              type: string
              nullable: true
            fromSeller:
              type: string
              nullable: true
    Person:
      type: object
      required: 
        - firstName
        - lastName 
        - email 
        - contanctId 
      properties: 
        firstName:
          type: string
        lastName: 
          type: string
        email: 
          type: string
        contactId: 
          type: string
    Money:
      type: object
      title: Money
      required: 
         - amount
         - currency
      properties: 
        amount:   
          type: integer
        currency:
          type: object
          required:
            - code
          properties: 
            code: 
              type: string
    HotelAgreement: 
      type: object
      title: HotelAgreement
      nullable: true
      required: 
        - hotelAgreementId
        - dealId
        - conditions 
        - specialInstructions 
      properties: 
        hotelAgreementId:
          type: string 
        hotelId:
          type: string 
        hotelAgreementStatus:
          type: string 
        stayDateRanges:
          type: object
          properties:
            start: 
              type: string
            end: 
              type: string
        sellableInDateRanges:
          type: object
          properties:
            start: 
              type: string
            end: 
              type: string
        commission:
          type: string
          nullable: true 
          properties: 
            count: 
              type: number
            type: 
              type: string
        dealId: 
          type: string 
        conditions: 
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        discount:
          type: object
          properties:
            count:
              type: integer
            type:
              type: string
        specialInstructions: 
          type: string
          nullable: true
        dealsSellable:
          type: object
          properties:
            remaining:
              type: integer
            max: 
              type: number
        href:
          type: string
        lengthOfStay:
          type: object
          title: LengthOfStay
          properties: 
            min: 
              type: integer
            max:  
              type: integer
        cancellationPolicy:
          type: object
          title: CancellationPolicy
          nullable: true
          properties: 
            count: 
              type: number
            type: 
              type: string
        createdAt: 
          type: string 
        updatedAt:  
          type: string        
    Condition: 
      type: object
      required:
        - cancellationDeadline
        - cancellationPolicy
      properties:
        cancellationPolicy:
          type: string
          nullable: true 
        cancellationDeadline:
          type: string
    Adjustment: 
      type: object
      required: 
        - amount
        - type
      properties:
        adjustmentId:
          type: string
        amount:
          type: number
        type: 
          type: string
        conditions: 
          type: object
          properties:
            type: 
              type: string
            rules: 
              type: object
              properties:
                bookableDataRange: 
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    start:  
                      type: string
                    end: 
                      type: string
                nightsRange:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    min: 
                      type: number
                    max: 
                      type: number
    Restriction:
      type: obejct
      properties: 
        lengthOfStay:
          type: object
          properties:
            min:
              type: number
            max: 
              type: number
    DealRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        dealRequestId:
          type: string
        dealRequestStatus:
          type: string
        stayDateRanges:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties: 
              start: 
                type: string
              end: 
                type: string
        sellableInDateRanges:
          type: array
          items: 
            type: object
            properties:
              start: 
                type: string
              end: 
                type: string
        commission:
          type: object
          nullable: true
        discount:
          type: object
        specialInstructions:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        lengthOfStay:
          type: object
          properties: 
            min: 
              type: string
            max:
              type: string
              nullable: true
        cancellationPolicy:
          type: object
          nullable: true
        createdAt:  
          type: string
        updatedAt:  
          type: string
        bookingWindowRestriction:
          type: object
          nullable: true
          properties: 
            minDaysBeforeCheckIn:
              type: number
            maxDaysBeforeCheckIn:
              type: number
        dealType:
          type: string
tags:
  - name: hotels
  - name: hotels > {hotel Id}
  - name: bookings
  - name: bookings > {booking Id}
  - name: deal-requests
  - name: deal-requests > {deal Request Id}
  - name: deal-requests > {deal Request Id} > agreements
paths:
  /hotels/{hotelId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - hotels > {hotel Id}
      summary: Retrieve a hotel
      operationId: getHotel
      description: >-
        Returns the full content, room types and rates for the specified hotel.


        When querying the hotels API you can query with or without dates. Where
        querying with dates requires providing valid values for the `start` and
        `end` parameters. Requests without these values will be considered a
        query without dates.


        **Querying without dates:**


        When you query without dates, the search result will include all
        properties that match your request. Including all content that is
        associated with those properties. However you will find that the `rates`
        attribute for each room will always be empty.


        **Querying with dates:**


        When you query with dates, the search result will include all properties
        that match your request, including all content that is associated with
        those properties. However, hotels with no available rooms will be
        filtered out of the result. For the remaining hotels all rooms will be
        represented within the result regardless of whether they are available.
        Rooms which do not have available prices for the provided dates will
        appear with an empty `rates` array.


        For rooms where there are available prices the `rates` array will
        include both the public rates of the hotel, along with prices that come
        from deals in which you are participating. This would include private
        deals which you have negotiated with a hotel, along with Impala deals
        which you have been verified for.


        Using the `rateId` of any of those rates, you can use the [Create a
        booking](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/spec/openapi.seller.yaml/paths/~1bookings/post)
        endpoint to make a booking.
      parameters:
        - name: start
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            The arrival day of the desired stay range in ISO 8601 format
            (`YYYY-MM-DD`).
          example: '2021-05-20'
        - name: end
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            The departure day of the desired stay range in ISO 8601 format
            (`YYYY-MM-DD`).
          example: '2021-05-22'
        - name: hotelId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: >-
            (Required) The unique identifier of this hotel on the Impala
            platform.
          example: d3a39e9c-14fe-b399-cacf-f1284a817237
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Hotel"
              example:
                hotelId: 0e25533a-2db2-4894-9db1-4c1ff92d798c
                name: Impala All-Inclusive Always Available Resort (Example Hotel)
                starRating: 5
                description:
                  short: >-
                    This fictional example hotel allows you to experience all
                    the content, rates and features the Impala platform
                    (https://impala.travel) has to offer. Testing with this
                    hotel allows you to experience the full breadth of
                    functionality and rate options hotels might offer on Impala
                    â€“ and to ensure your app displays everything correctly.
                currency: GBP
                websiteUrl: https://impala-all-avaialable-resort.hotel/
                phoneNumbers:
                  - '+48789789789'
                emails:
                  - mail@impala-all-avaialable-resort.hotel
                externalUrls:
                  - name: BOOKING.COM
                    url: https://www.booking.com/hotel/im/impala
                  - name: HOTELS.COM
                    url: https://uk.hotels.com/imp123456/
                images:
                  - altText: null
                    height: 1536
                    width: 2884
                    url: >-
                      https://cdn.impala.travel/properties/ckiuattho00013e6ar0tiilgt.jpg
                    isHeroImage: true
                  - altText: null
                    height: 2461
                    width: 3072
                    url: >-
                      https://cdn.impala.travel/properties/ckiuavcvm00023e6aordygdiy.jpg
                    isHeroImage: false
                  - altText: null
                    height: 3640
                    width: 2912
                    url: >-
                      https://cdn.impala.travel/properties/ckiuavvr100033e6ajep6w5dl.jpg
                    isHeroImage: false
                  - altText: null
                    height: 2848
                    width: 4288
                    url: >-
                      https://cdn.impala.travel/properties/ckiuawdeo00043e6ajyqc70nm.jpg
                    isHeroImage: false
                  - altText: null
                    height: 3072
                    width: 4608
                    url: >-
                      https://cdn.impala.travel/properties/ckiuawt9y00053e6a76l0qgqe.jpg
                    isHeroImage: false
                address:
                  line1: 456 Impala Street
                  line2: null
                  city: Impalaland
                  postalCode: 0987-654
                  region: Impalaland Beach
                  country: GBR
                  countryName: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
                location:
                  longitude: -9.952549
                  latitude: 58.386186
                amenities:
                  - code: 5
                    formatted: Air conditioning
                  - code: 7
                    formatted: ATM/Cash machine
                  - code: 8
                    formatted: Baby sitting
                  - code: 9
                    formatted: BBQ/Picnic area
                  - code: 14
                    formatted: Business library
                  - code: 16
                    formatted: Casino
                  - code: 22
                    formatted: Concierge desk
                roomTypes:
                  - roomTypeId: 7b4e914f-0551-4fdc-b349-db3c32c5afed
                    name: Single Room
                    description: >-
                      This is a fictional example room type that you can use to
                      test all the features you might encounter on any hotel
                      available on the Impala platform on the Impala platform
                      (https://impala.travel). Testing with this room type means
                      your app or site will be able to handle any values that
                      you might find on Impala.
                    maxOccupancy: 1
                    rates:
                      - rateId: >-
                          b0e2ec0fa2ae1b3697f467393558a69a:474f39c17490c46b4e622da1bffbd5c1
                        start: '2021-07-01'
                        end: '2021-07-02'
                        maxOccupancy: 1
                        retailRate:
                          total:
                            amount: 10500
                            currency:
                              code: EUR

                            includedInRate: []

                        sellerCommissionPercentage: 10
                        components: []
                        cancellationPolicies:
                          - formatted: Non-refundable after March 11, 2021 00:23
                            start: '2021-03-11 00:23:35.718'
                            fee:
                              type: PERCENTAGE

                                amount: 10500

                      - rateId: >-

                            fee:
                              type: NONE

                                amount: 0

                          - formatted: Non-refundable after June 29, 2021 00:00

                      - rateId: >-

                        start: '2021-07-01'

                            fee:
                              type: PERCENTAGE
                              count: 100
                              price:
                                amount: 9975

                                  code: EUR
                      - rateId: >-
                          38143de2077774891c4f136d86ce817a:7fa93ac18e3851dec34dead83648148f
                        start: '2021-07-01'

  /hotels/{hotelId}/rate-plans:
    get:
      tags:
        - hotels > {hotel Id}
      summary: List all rate plans (rate calendar) for a hotel (Beta endpoint)
      operationId: listRatePlans
      description: >-
        Returns a list of all rate plans available for you for a hotel.


        Rate plans are products the hotel is offering. They typically consist of
        a combination of restrictiveness in case of cancellations or changes,
        the time they're bookable, minimum or maximum length of stay
        restrictions (e.g. week-long bookings), included components like
        breakfast or dinner and/or the conditions under which the room can be
        sold (e.g. private rates that can only be offered and sold to a closed
        user group behind login).


        Examples of rate plans:


        * Non-refundable room rate that includes breakfast

        * Room-only rate with free cancellation up to 14 days before arrival


        For each such rate plan this endpoint returns the room types it's
        available for, alongside prices for each date and occupancy that can be
        sold â€“ or the information that the room isn't available (closed) for a
        certain date.


        For the vast majority of our customers, availability searches using the
        [List all
        hotels](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/spec/openapi.seller.yaml/paths/~1hotels/get)
        endpoint are the best choice. It accepts the dates your guest is looking
        for and provides the rates to display.


        This endpoint can help augment this for two additional use cases:


        This endpoint allows you to query rate prices for all future dates in
        one go, making it a great choice to feed availability information and
        prices into your own system or displaying a rate calender to guide your
        guests to gain an overview of future availability and prices.
      parameters:
        - name: updatedAt[lt]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Returns rate plans changed after the supplied date.
          example: '2022-11-04T15:56:37.000Z'
        - name: updatedAt[lte]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Returns rate plans changed after the supplied date.
          example: '2022-11-04T15:56:37.000Z'
        - name: updatedAt[eq]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Returns rate plans changed after the supplied date.
          example: '2022-11-04T15:56:37.000Z'
        - name: updatedAt[gt]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Returns rate plans changed after the supplied date.
          example: '2022-11-04T15:56:37.000Z'
        - name: updatedAt[gte]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Returns rate plans changed after the supplied date.
          example: '2022-11-04T15:56:37.000Z'
        - name: size
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
          description: Number of hotels returned on a given page (pagination).
          example: '40'
        - name: offset
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
          description: Offset from the first hotel in the result (for pagination).
          example: '25'
        - name: hotelId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: (Required) The uuid of hotel for which rate plans are being fetched.
          example: 40c0b330-186a-40bf-ae36-2c61fb322db0
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                title: RatePlanInfo
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: object
                    required:
                      - ratePlanId 
                      - hotelId
                      - description
                      - conditions
                      - restrictions
                      - roomTypes
                      - adjustments
                    properties: 
                      ratePlanId:
                        type: number
                      hotelId:
                        type: string
                      description:
                        type: string
                      components:
                        type: array
                        items: 
                          properties:
                            formatted: 
                              type: string
                            type:       
                              type: string 
                            includedInRate: 
                              type: boolean
                      conditions:
                        type: object
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Condition"
                      restrictions: 
                        type: object
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Restriction"
                      roomTypes:  
                        type: array
                        items:
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/RoomTypes"
                      adjustments:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Adjustment"
                  pagination:
                    type: object
                    title: Pagination
                    properties: 
                      count:
                        type: integer
                      total:  
                        type: integer
                      next: 
                        type: string
                        nullable: true
                      prev:
                        type: string
                        nullable: true

  /hotels:
    get:
      tags:
        - hotels
      summary: List all hotels
      operationId: listHotels
      description: >-
        Returns a list of all hotels worldwide that can be booked through
        Impala.

        You can **filter** the results:

        * Adding `longitude`, `latitude` and a `radius` (in meters) query
        parameters will filter the results to hotels around this location.

        * Adding `start` and `end` dates (in ISO 8601 notation, e.g.
        `2021-12-31`) for the expected arrival and departure dates of your
        guests will limit the results to hotels that have at least one room
        bookable for this timeframe.

        * Adding `starRating`, `name` or `country` allows you to filter to
        hotels based on these values (e.g.
        `?starRating[gte]=4&name[like]=palace` for hotels with a rating of 4 or
        up with a name containing "palace")

        * Adding `hotelIds` allows you to limit the results to include only
        hotels with the ids listed. Its value should be a comma-separated list
        of hotel ids (e.g. `?hotelIds={hotelId},{hotelId}`).


        You can specify the **sorting order** in which hotels are returned:

        * This is done by using the `sortBy` query parameter.

        * Results can be sorted by `name` alphabetically, star `rating` and
        `distance_m` (in meters from the specified latitude/longitude location).

        * The parameter allows for a comma-separated list of arguments with
        optional `:asc` (ascending, the default if the modifier is omitted) and
        `:desc` (descending) modifiers.


        If no hotels match your filter criteria, an empty array will be
        returned.
      parameters:
        - name: name[eq]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on the property name. Available modifiers
            include equal to (`eq`) or case insensitive search (`like`). Usage
            example: `?name[like]=palace`
          example: Minimalist Palace
        - name: name[like]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on the property name. Available modifiers
            include equal to (`eq`) or case insensitive search (`like`). Usage
            example: `?name[like]=palace`
          example: palace
        - name: starRating[lt]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on the starRating of a property.
            Available modifiers include less than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`),
            less than or equal to (`lte`), greater than or equal to (`gte`) and
            equal to (`eq`). Usage example: `?starRating[gt]=3&starRating[lt]=5`
          example: '4'
        - name: starRating[lte]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on the starRating of a property.
            Available modifiers include less than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`),
            less than or equal to (`lte`), greater than or equal to (`gte`) and
            equal to (`eq`). Usage example: `?starRating[gt]=3&starRating[lt]=5`
          example: '3'
        - name: starRating[eq]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on the starRating of a property.
            Available modifiers include less than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`),
            less than or equal to (`lte`), greater than or equal to (`gte`) and
            equal to (`eq`). Usage example: `?starRating[gt]=3&starRating[lt]=5`
          example: '4'
        - name: starRating[gt]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on the starRating of a property.
            Available modifiers include less than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`),
            less than or equal to (`lte`), greater than or equal to (`gte`) and
            equal to (`eq`). Usage example: `?starRating[gt]=3&starRating[lt]=5`
          example: '3'
        - name: starRating[gte]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on the starRating of a property.
            Available modifiers include less than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`),
            less than or equal to (`lte`), greater than or equal to (`gte`) and
            equal to (`eq`). Usage example: `?starRating[gt]=3&starRating[lt]=5`
          example: '4'
        - name: country[eq]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on the country of a property. The only
            available modifier for this parameter is equal to (`eq`). Usage
            example: `?country[eq]=GBR`
          example: GBR
        - name: start
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            The arrival day of the desired stay range in ISO 8601 format
            (`YYYY-MM-DD`).
          example: '2021-05-20'
        - name: end
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            The departure day of the desired stay range in ISO 8601 format
            (`YYYY-MM-DD`).
          example: '2021-05-22'
        - name: latitude
          in: query
          schema:
            type: number
          description: >-
            The WGS 84 latitude of the location to search around (e.g.
            `58.386186`).
          example: '58.386186'
        - name: longitude
          in: query
          schema:
            type: number
          description: >-
            The WGS 84 longitude of the location to search around (e.g.
            `-9.952549`).
          example: '-9.952549'
        - name: radius
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
          description: >-
            The distance (in meters) to search around the specified location
            (e.g. `10000` for 10 km).
          example: '25000'
        - name: hotelIds
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            A comma-separated list of hotel ids you wish to filter by (e.g.
            `60a06628-2c71-44bf-9685-efbd2df4179e,60a06628-2c71-44bf-9685-efbd2df4179e`).
          example: >-
            0e25533a-2db2-4894-9db1-4c1ff92d798c,77c272b6-18e6-4036-b9c3-7fc5454e3f6a
        - name: created[lt]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: number
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on the date and time when this hotel was
            first added to the Impala platform, in ISO 8601 format (e.g.
            `2020-11-04T17:37:37Z`) and UTC timezone. Available modifiers
            include less than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`), lower than or equal
            to (`lte`), greater than or equal to (`gte`) and equal to (`eq`).
            Usage example:
            `?created[lte]=2020-11-04T19:37:37Z&created[gte]=2020-11-04T15:56:37.000Z`
          example: '2020-11-04T15:56:37.000Z'
        - name: created[lte]

  /bookings/{bookingId}:
    put:
      tags:
        - bookings > {booking Id}
      summary: Change a booking
      operationId: updateBooking
      description: >-
        <!-- theme: danger -->


        > Updates the specified booking with immediate effect. This action might
        result in a cancellation charge being charged.


        > Please note that if you wish to change the contact details associated
        with a booking, you should use the [Change a Booking's Contact
        Details](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/spec/openapi.seller.yaml/paths/~1bookings~1%7BbookingId%7D~1booking-contact/put)
        endpoint.


        Changes / updates a confirmed booking with the details you provide in
        the request body.


        When your guest needs to change their booking, you can use this endpoint
        to change any of the details you initially supplied when you [made their
        booking](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/spec/openapi.seller.yaml/paths/~1bookings/post),
        e.g. you'll need to query for availability and use the
        `roomTypes[].rates[].rateId` that are available currently for their new
        stay dates. Any new rates selected must be for the same hotel as the
        original booking.


        A booking cannot be updated on or after the check in day of the original
        or new stay.


        In addition, we require you do supply a
        `updateBookingVersionAtTimestamp` field with the `updatedAt` timestamp
        of the booking. You can find this value by looking up the booking via
        the [Retrieve a
        booking](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/spec/openapi.seller.yaml/paths/~1bookings~1%7BbookingId%7D/get)
        endpoint. This is to avoid race conditions where another update might
        have happened since the last time you have checked for the current
        details of this booking.


        The `status` of this booking will switch back to `PENDING` until we have
        submitted and confirmed the new details with the hotel.


        <!-- theme: warning -->


        > **This request might take up to 20 seconds to load.** While we work to
        return a response to your request within milliseconds in most cases,
        some bookings require us to re-verify current pricing in real-time and
        doing so might take up to 20 seconds. Please make sure your app handles
        this waiting state appropriately.
      requestBody:
        description: >-
          Payload on updating a booking 
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              title: UpdateBookingPayload
              description: >- 
                Payload on updating a booking.
              properties:
                start: 
                  type: string 
                end: 
                  type: string 
                bookingContact:
                  type: object
                  properties: 
                    firstName: 
                      type: string 
                    lastName: 
                      type: string
                    email: 
                      type: string 
                rooms: 
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    rateId: 
                      type: string
                    adults:
                      type: number
              example:
                start: '2019-08-24'
                end: '2019-08-24'
                bookingContact:
                  firstName: JocelÃ­n
                  lastName: CarreÃ³n Sample
                  email: jocelin.carreon.crespo@example.com
                rooms:
                  - rateId: i8fIZ277SPDq4UohuxAft5Sr29UhMvyc0VypRxLiRFLoTk0XHmEbgSQ
                    adults: 2
                updateBookingVersionAtTimestamp: '2020-12-20T11:01:30.745Z'
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/json
          description: >-
            (optional) content-type header
        - name: bookingId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: >-
            (Required) The unique identifier of the booking you would like to
            update.
          example: ex
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:

      summary: Cancel a booking
      operationId: cancelBooking
      description: >-
        <!-- theme: danger -->


        > Cancels the specified booking with immediate effect. This action might
        result in a cancellation charge being charged.


        Submitting this request means we'll notify the hotel of the cancellation
        and that they won't expect your guest.


        You can use `GET /bookings/{bookingId}`to see the cancellation policies
        that apply to a booking at a given point in time. Please note that
        cancelling a booking will incur a cancellation fee according to the
        rules that apply at the time of cancellation. You can find the
        cancellation fee that has been charged in the response of this call in
        the `cancellation.fee` object.


        If the booking you cancelled allows for a partial or full refund, we'll
        credit your Impala balance with the amount we charged you as the seller
        of this booking â€“ meaning we'll deduct the amount the next time we're
        requesting payment for the sum of all the bookings you made.

  /bookings:
    post:
      tags:
        - bookings
      summary: Create a booking
      operationId: createBooking
      description: >-
        Creates a booking for for the rate and dates you specify in the request
        body.


        You'll need a `roomTypes[].rates[].rateId` that's bookable for those
        dates, which you can find using the [Retrieve a
        hotel](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/spec/openapi.seller.yaml/paths/~1hotels~1%7BhotelId%7D/get)
        endpoint.


        There are two different flows depending on how your profile has been
        configured:


        **1. Paid via you**


        If you have provided a credit card on the dashboard then **Impala will
        send the booking to the hotel immediately**. We'll ensure payment is
        taken care of before your guest arrives at the hotel.


        * Your guest needs to be **paying you** the rate specified in
        `retailRate` (as listed in the [Retrieve a
        hotel](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/spec/openapi.seller.yaml/paths/~1hotels~1%7BhotelId%7D/get)
        response) before you submit this request.

        * Once your request is received and the booking is confirmed, **Impala
        will charge you** as the seller this `retailRate` minus the
        `sellerCommissionPercentage` (which is the affiliate commission you get
        to keep). We'll use the business credit card you've added to your
        account as payment method for this.

        * The difference between the amount you charge your guest (`retailRate`,
        e.g. 200 â‚¬) and what Impala charges you (`retailRate` minus
        `sellerCommissionPercentage`, e.g. 200 â‚¬) is your commission (in this
        example: 20 â‚¬) to keep.


        You can find more information on how money flows between your guest and
        you, and you and Impala, [in this
        article](https://impala.stoplight.io/docs/booking-api/branches/v1.003/docs/good-to-know/payments-and-commissions.md)


        **2. Payment via the guest**


        If you are set-up to collect payment details, then you can forward these
        to Impala through the`/payments` endpoint. If you are set up for this
        flow then:


        * We will create the booking in a `PENDING` state

        * We will return a `paymentBearerToken` that you must use to authorise
        with the /payments endpoint. This will be valid for **5 minutes** after
        which point the booking will be marked as abandoned.

        * We require you to send a payment auth callback url as part of the
        booking request. This is used in the event that further authorisation is
        required by the paying guests bank. You will need to redirect the guest
        to a URL passed back by the bank. Upon completion they will redirect the
        user back to the URL you sent in the booking request.


        In order to use this endpoint, you must confirm your payment flow and
        API keys with Impala. Please contact support@impala.travel to configure
        your flow.


        <!-- theme: warning -->


        > **This request might take up to 20 seconds to load.** While we work to
        return a response to your request within milliseconds in most cases,
        some bookings require us to re-verify current pricing in real-time and
        doing so might take up to 20 seconds. Please make sure your app handles
        this waiting state appropriately.
      requestBody:
        description: >-
          payload on create booking
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              title: CreateBookingPayload
              description: >- 
                payload on booking creation
              properties:
                start:
                  type: string
                end:
                  type: string
                dealId:
                  type: string
                bookingContact:
                  type: object
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Person"
                notes:
                  type: object
                  properties: 
                    fromGuest: 
                      type: string
                    fromSeller:
                      type: string
                rooms:
                  type: array
                  title: BookingRoomDataPerRoom
                  items:  
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      rateId: 
                        type: number
                      adults: 
                        type: number
                      notes: 
                        type: object
                        properties: 
                          fromGuest:
                            type: string 
                          fromSeller:
                            type: string
                paymentType: 
                  type: string
              example:
                start: '2019-08-24'
                end: '2019-08-24'
                bookingContact:
                  firstName: JocelÃ­n
                  lastName: CarreÃ³n Sample
                  email: jocelin.carreon.crespo@example.com
                rooms:
                  - rateId: i8fIZ277SPDq4UohuxAft5Sr29UhMvyc0VypRxLiRFLoTk0XHmEbgSQ
                    adults: 2
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header

            type: string

          description: >-
            (optional) content-type header
      responses:
        '202':

          content:
            application/json:

                type: object

              example:
                bookingId: IM-0199-00000103
                status: ACCEPTED
                hotelConfirmationCode: 04M3995
                start: '2020-10-21'
                end: '2020-10-24'

                  fromGuest: I am travelling with my family
                  fromSeller: ''

    get:
      tags:
        - bookings
      summary: List all bookings
      operationId: listBookings
      description: >-
        Returns a list of all the bookings you've made.


        You can filter the list based on when bookings were created or last
        updated, as well as their arrival (`start`) and departure (`end`). These
        date-based filters allow to narrow down the result with modifiers for
        less than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`), lower than or equal to (`lte`),
        greater than or equal to (`gte`) and equal to (`eq`).


        Example: Adding the query parameters
        `start[gt]=2021-05-20&updated[lte]=2020-11-20T11:11:00.000Z` would
        return bookings arriving after May 20th, 2020 that were updated before
        or on November 20th, 2020 at 11:11 am UTC.
      parameters:
        - name: start[lt]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on arrival date of the booking in ISO
            8601 format (e.g. `2021-12-01`). Available modifiers include less
            than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`), lower than or equal to (`lte`),
            greater than or equal to (`gte`) and equal to (`eq`). Usage example:
            `?start[lte]=2021-12-20&start[gte]=2021-12-10`
          example: '2021-12-20'
        - name: start[lte]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on arrival date of the booking in ISO
            8601 format (e.g. `2021-12-01`). Available modifiers include less
            than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`), lower than or equal to (`lte`),
            greater than or equal to (`gte`) and equal to (`eq`). Usage example:
            `?start[lte]=2021-12-20&start[gte]=2021-12-10`
          example: '2021-12-20'
        - name: start[eq]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on arrival date of the booking in ISO
            8601 format (e.g. `2021-12-01`). Available modifiers include less
            than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`), lower than or equal to (`lte`),
            greater than or equal to (`gte`) and equal to (`eq`). Usage example:
            `?start[lte]=2021-12-20&start[gte]=2021-12-10`
          example: '2021-12-20'
        - name: start[gt]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on arrival date of the booking in ISO
            8601 format (e.g. `2021-12-01`). Available modifiers include less
            than (`lt`), greater than (`gt`), lower than or equal to (`lte`),
            greater than or equal to (`gte`) and equal to (`eq`). Usage example:
            `?start[lte]=2021-12-20&start[gte]=2021-12-10`
          example: '2021-12-20'
        - name: start[gte]
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >-
            Allows for filtering based on arrival date of the booking in ISO

  /bookings/with-rate-details:
    post:
      tags:
        - bookings
      summary: Create a booking with rate details
      operationId: createBookingWithRateDetails
      description: >-
        > Please refer to the [supported booking
        workflows](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/docs/good-to-know/booking-workflows.md) 
        to get a better understanding of the purpose of this endpoint.


        Creates a confirmed booking for for the rate and dates you specify in
        the request body.


        **Impala will send the booking to the hotel immediately**. We'll ensure
        payment is taken care of before your guest arrives at the hotel.
      requestBody:
        description: >-
          Payload on creating a booking with rate details

          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              title: CreateBookingWithRateDetailsPayload
              description: >- 
                payload on creating a booking with rate details
              properties:
                start:
                  type: string
                end:
                  type: string
                dealId:
                  type: string

                  type: object

                      type: string

                  type: object
                  properties: 
                    fromGuest: 
                      type: string
                    fromSeller:
                      type: string
                rooms:
                  type: array

                    type: object
                    properties:

                      roomTypeId:
                        type: number
                      adults: 
                        type: number
                      notes: 
                        type: object
                        properties: 
                          fromGuest:
                            type: string 
                          fromSeller:
                            type: string
                paymentType:  
                  type: string 
                updateBookingVersionAtTimestamp:
                  type: string

  /deal-requests/{dealRequestId}/agreements:
    get:
      tags:
        - deal-requests > {deal Request Id} > agreements
      summary: List all hotel agreements for a deal request
      operationId: listHotelAgreements
      description: >-
        Returns a list of all agreements for a particular deal.


        Agreements show you which hotels have accepted/rejected the conditions
        of a deal request.


        Deal requests allow you to negotiate conditions that apply to your site
        or app on the Impala platform.


        You should use the agreement endpoints to list the hotels that have
        accepted your deal.


        [Read more about how deal requests
        work.](https://docs.impala.travel/docs/booking-api/docs/good-to-know/deal-requests-and-hotel-agreements.md)
      parameters:
        - name: dealRequestId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: (Required) The unique identifier for this deal request
          example: ex
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                title: ListOfHotelAgreements
                properties:
                  data: 
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: "#/components/schemas/HotelAgreement"
                  pagination:
                    type: object
                    title: Pagination
                    properties: 
                      count:
                        type: integer
                      total:  
                        type: integer
                      next: 
                        type: string
                        nullable: true
                      prev:
                        type: string
                        nullable: true
              example:
                data:
                  - hotelAgreementId: A82983
                    hotelId: D4578932323
                    hotelAgreementStatus: ACCEPTED
                    stayDateRanges:
                      - start: '2021-01-01'
                        end: '2021-12-31'
                    sellableInDateRanges:
                      - start: '2021-01-01'
                        end: '2021-12-31'
                    conditions:
                      - PRIVATE_RATE
                      - PRIVATE_RATE

                      count: 14
                      type: PERCENTAGE
                    discount:
                      count: 5
                      type: PERCENTAGE
                    specialInstructions: >-
                      This deal can only be sold via desktop (not allowed for
                      mobile apps)

                      min: 1
                      max: 14
                    cancellationPolicy:
                      count: 2
                      type: DAYS_BEFORE_ARRIVAL_AT_MIDNIGHT
                    dealsSellable:
                      max: 26826921.004251853
                    createdAt: '2020-01-01T10:36:25.267Z'
                    updatedAt: '2020-11-27T10:46:35.569Z'
                  - hotelAgreementId: A82983
                    hotelId: D4578932323
                    hotelAgreementStatus: ACCEPTED
                    stayDateRanges:
                      - start: '2021-01-01'
                        end: '2021-12-31'
                    sellableInDateRanges:
                      - start: '2021-01-01'
                        end: '2021-12-31'
                    conditions:
                      - PRIVATE_RATE
                      - PRIVATE_RATE
                    commission:
                      count: 14
                      type: PERCENTAGE
